Text: Irene Cara:  She sang and co-wrote the international hit song 'Flashdance... What a Feeling' (from the movie "Flashdance"), for which she won an Academy Award for Best Original Song and a Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance in 1984.
Triplets:<Irene Cara

--------------------
<Text: Irene Cara:  Cara also played the title character Sparkle Williams in the 1976 film "Sparkle".>
